name: @9elt/miniframe
description: A small library to create state aware html elements using JavaScript objects

scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && cp index.d.ts dist/esm && echo '{"type":"module"}' >dist/esm/package.json
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.pub: npm run test && npm run build && npm publish

author: Lorenzo Cicuttin
